name: Reveal.js Master Plugin
tagline: Headers, Footers and conditional Page-Numbering for Reveal.js
body:
# Initialization ```javascript Reveal.initialize({ master: { header: { size: '60%', left: 'Great Presentation', right: '', }, footer: { size: '60%', left: 'John Doe', center: 'Fancy Something', right: '#{slideNumber} / #{slideCount}' } }, controls: false, dependencies: [ /* [...] */ { src: 'master.js', async: true } ] }); ``` # Usage ```html
Title Slide
Slide with header and footer.
Uncounted slide with header only.
Another slide with header and footer.
Counted slide without header.
Questions?
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
